svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 23 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 23, 2023" date: "2023-12-22"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì execution (ACDE) call video . Recap by Tim Beiko .¬† Notes from Tim Beiko and
Christine Kim : Testnet upgrade dates : Goerli Jan 17 (epoch 231680), then assuming no issues, single
client releases for Sepolia Jan 30 (epoch 132608) & Hole≈°ky Feb 7 (epoch 29696) Goerli shadow fork 1
analysis : 290 nodes across 4 continents with all clients except Erigon; blobs increased network usage
by ~200kbps & block latency by ~300ms Precompile address ranges: upper half of range reserved for L2s
Prague/Electra planning : discussed potential small upgrade then Verkle-only upgrade
‚Ä¢ Testnet upgrade dates : Goerli Jan 17 (epoch 231680), then assuming no issues, single client
releases for Sepolia Jan 30 (epoch 132608) & Hole≈°ky Feb 7 (epoch 29696)
Testnet upgrade dates : Goerli Jan 17 (epoch 231680), then assuming no issues, single client releases
for Sepolia Jan 30 (epoch 132608) & Hole≈°ky Feb 7 (epoch 29696)
‚Ä¢ Goerli shadow fork 1 analysis : 290 nodes across 4 continents with all clients except Erigon; blobs
increased network usage by ~200kbps & block latency by ~300ms
Goerli shadow fork 1 analysis : 290 nodes across 4 continents with all clients except Erigon; blobs
‚Ä¢ Precompile address ranges: upper half of range reserved for L2s
Precompile address ranges: upper half of range reserved for L2s
‚Ä¢ Prague/Electra planning : discussed potential small upgrade then Verkle-only upgrade
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.67% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.67% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ EIP3074 (AUTH & AUTHCALL) nonce proposal to allow revocation
EIP3074 (AUTH & AUTHCALL) nonce proposal to allow revocation
‚Ä¢ Verkle implementers call notes
Verkle implementers call notes
‚Ä¢ evmone v0.11.0 : full Cancun support
evmone v0.11.0 : full Cancun support
‚Ä¢ Blocknative transaction pool data archive , > 8TB of data, since November 2019
Blocknative transaction pool data archive , > 8TB of data, since November 2019
MEV
‚Ä¢ PBS Foundation pilot grants : infrastructure, research, data transparency & community education
PBS Foundation pilot grants : infrastructure, research, data transparency & community education
‚Ä¢ bloXroute MEV-Boost relays rejecting blocks with OFAC transactions
bloXroute MEV-Boost relays rejecting blocks with OFAC transactions
‚Ä¢ MEV-Boost community call notes
MEV-Boost community call notes
For Stakers
‚Ä¢ L1 & L2 (Base) node on $189 ARM64 board, proof of concept
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.13.0 : logs info on connected service URLs, supports voluntary exits by
remote signers and performance improvements Teku v23.12.1 : fixes minor bugs in v23.12.0, validator
client not compatible with Lighthouse beacon nodes
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.13.0 : logs info on connected service URLs, supports voluntary exits by remote signers
and performance improvements
Lodestar v1.13.0 : logs info on connected service URLs, supports voluntary exits by remote signers and
performance improvements
‚Ä¢ Teku v23.12.1 : fixes minor bugs in v23.12.0, validator client not compatible with Lighthouse beacon
nodes
Teku v23.12.1 : fixes minor bugs in v23.12.0, validator client not compatible with Lighthouse beacon
‚Ä¢ Execution layer Geth v1.13.8 : hotfix for refusing to start after shutdown during sync; v1.13.7 :
eth_sendTransaction RPC improved for low-fee txs; v1.13.6 : faster gas estimation with 1.5% error
ratio & non-deterministic and logging changed to slog (Go logging framework)
Execution layer
‚Ä¢ Geth v1.13.8 : hotfix for refusing to start after shutdown during sync; v1.13.7 :
Research
‚Ä¢ Timing games: impact of intentional vs unintentional delays , validators needing longer signature
times (e.g. DVT) won‚Äôt be able to play timing games as efficiently
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ Arbitrum One Sequencer downtime & L1 gas pricing issue post-mortem
Arbitrum One Sequencer downtime & L1 gas pricing issue post-mortem
‚Ä¢ L2Beat‚Äôs risk analysis exit window : available time to exit L2 before an upgrade is executed
L2Beat‚Äôs risk analysis exit window : available time to exit L2 before an upgrade is executed
‚Ä¢ Gelato rollup deployment platform : choose OP Stack or Polygon CDK
Gelato rollup deployment platform : choose OP Stack or Polygon CDK
‚Ä¢ Once an OG ‚ÄúETH killer‚Äù: Lisk plans migration to OP Stack rollup
Once an OG ‚ÄúETH killer‚Äù: Lisk plans migration to OP Stack rollup
‚Ä¢ Manta Pacific stops publishing calldata to Ethereum; sidechain DA but done with minimal security
Manta Pacific stops publishing calldata to Ethereum; sidechain DA but done with minimal security
‚Ä¢ 20% of mainnet gas is now used for L2 data
20% of mainnet gas is now used for L2 data
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Hardhat v2.19.3 : Solidity v0.8.23 support
Hardhat v2.19.3 : Solidity v0.8.23 support
‚Ä¢ Tip: Solidity v0.8.13-21 via-IR code generator can result in different but equivalent bytecode when
using dependencies via symlinks, causing verification issues, fixed in v0.8.22
Tip: Solidity v0.8.13-21 via-IR code generator can result in different but equivalent bytecode when
‚Ä¢ CreateX : contract deployer using CREATE/2/3, factory live on mainnet & L2s
CreateX : contract deployer using CREATE/2/3, factory live on mainnet & L2s
‚Ä¢ Vyper LSP (Language Server Protocol): errors/warnings, auto-complete, code navigation & hover-over
info
Vyper LSP (Language Server Protocol): errors/warnings, auto-complete, code navigation & hover-over
‚Ä¢ Ape v0.7.0 : test account key pairs same HD path as Anvil/Hardhat and upgraded to Pydantic v2
Ape v0.7.0 : test account key pairs same HD path as Anvil/Hardhat and upgraded to Pydantic v2
‚Ä¢ Guide to decoding raw EVM calldata
Guide to decoding raw EVM calldata
‚Ä¢ Curta Golf : gas optimization competition, Par NFT for valid entry, King NFT for most optimized
Curta Golf : gas optimization competition, Par NFT for valid entry, King NFT for most optimized
‚Ä¢ Secureum RACE #24: 12 question Solidity quiz & answers RACE #0: Solidity quiz explainers [videos]
Secureum

RACE #24: 12 question Solidity quiz & answers

RACE #0: Solidity quiz explainers [videos]

Stealth address (ERC5564) library implemented in Zig
‚Ä¢ Quint : specification language based on TLA
Quint : specification language based on TLA
‚Ä¢ Kumavis: LavaMoat (JavaScript supply chain security) and the Ledger supply chain attack
Kumavis: LavaMoat (JavaScript supply chain security) and the Ledger supply chain attack
Security
‚Ä¢ NFT exploits: NFT Trader (p2p trading) exploit via reentrancy of older contracts, some NFTs
recovered Flooring protocol (fractionalize NFTs) exploit via external multicall
NFT exploits:
‚Ä¢ NFT Trader (p2p trading) exploit via reentrancy of older contracts, some NFTs recovered
NFT Trader (p2p trading) exploit via reentrancy of older contracts, some NFTs recovered

EF Q3 grantees share $9M in funding

Etherscan refresh NFT image & metadata

inscriptions dashboard , 90% of Goerli testnet gas this week
Inscriptions explainer : tokens stored in low cost calldata with offchain indexers

Enterprise
‚Ä¢ EEA Ethereum business readiness report
Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 20.1 to 289.8 gwei, with 47.7 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 21.9 gwei 19k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 20.1 to 289.8 gwei, with 47.7 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei

19k ETH net burn this week
‚Ä¢ ETHUSD : $2,131 - $2,342, currently $2,314
ETHUSD : $2,131 - $2,342, currently $2,314
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ Sablier Airstreams : vesting airdrops via token streams, supports up to 50k recipients
Sablier Airstreams : vesting airdrops via token streams, supports up to 50k recipients
‚Ä¢ 3cities pay pages : payment to an address or ENS using mainnet & L2s
3cities pay pages : payment to an address or ENS using mainnet & L2s
‚Ä¢ Protocol rewards: Mirror & Sound split fixed fees between creator, referrer & protocol
Protocol rewards: Mirror & Sound split fixed fees between creator, referrer & protocol

Coordinape CoLinks (Friend Tech fork) live on Optimism, professional social network
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup
at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ $78M raised for Fairshake super PAC in Q4 to support pro-crypto leaders in 2024 US elections
$78M raised for Fairshake super PAC in Q4 to support pro-crypto leaders in 2024 US elections
‚Ä¢ Congress of Mexico approves decentralized justice as alternative dispute resolution mechanism
Congress of Mexico approves decentralized justice as alternative dispute resolution mechanism
General
‚Ä¢ Rekt: return of ape season
Rekt: return of ape season
‚Ä¢ Ledger replacing blind signing by June 2024 with Clear Signing (centralized registry)
Ledger replacing blind signing by June 2024 with Clear Signing (centralized registry)
‚Ä¢ Fake Calendly site asks to connect Twitter for account takeover
Fake Calendly site asks to connect Twitter for account takeover
‚Ä¢ Privacy & Scaling Explorations: applied Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE)

‚Ä¢ Trail of Bits: Forbidden attack on AES-GCM in secure enclaves to extract ECDSA private key

@evan_van_ness to get most of the week‚Äôs news in real time.
